Uses of Package
com.guardtime.ksi.publication

  • Packages that use com.guardtime.ksi.publication 
    Package Description
    com.guardtime.ksi
    KSI API interface.
    com.guardtime.ksi.multisignature
    Provides classes and interfaces to work with multi signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.publication
    Provides interfaces to decode and encode publications files.
    com.guardtime.ksi.publication.inmemory
    Provides implementation to decode and encode in-memory publications files.
    com.guardtime.ksi.service
    KSI Service classes.
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature
    Provides interfaces to decode and encode KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.inmemory
    Provides classes to decode and encode in-memory KSI signatures
    com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature.verifier
    Provides classes and interfaces to verify KSI signatures
  • Classes in com.guardtime.ksi.publication used by com.guardtime.ksi 
    Class and Description
    PublicationData
    Record of publication data, it is a pair consisting of the publication time and publication hash.
    PublicationRecord
    A `publication record' represents the information related to a published hash value, possibly including the publication reference.
    PublicationsFile
    KSI trust store provides trusted certificates and publications for verifying keyless signatures.
  • Classes in com.guardtime.ksi.publication used by com.guardtime.ksi.multisignature
